content: the new park city beanie is a great beginner friendly seed stitch pattern it was designed in collaboration with asylum fibers for stitch up chicago 2024 **features-** \-unisex design \- worked in the round \- ribbed texture \- suitable for all skill levels \- gauge 12 stitches and 11 row = 4 inches in seed stitch **materials needed-** \- yarn asylum fibers merino bulky 108 yards \- needles us size 9 9mm \- stitch marker \- tapestry needle
